empty:
No TOTP for the moment.
Feel free to add one !

qrCode.title: Add using a QR code
qrCode.subtitle: Scan a TOTP QR code and automatically add it to the app !

manually.title: Add manually
manually.subtitle: Manually enter your TOTP details (eg. secret, label, issuer, ...).

noCryptoStore.message: An error occurred while loading your crypto store. This means that we cannot do any encryption / decryption operation. Please restart the app or enter a new master password using the button below.

logInFailed.message: Failed to log in. Either retry, relogin or change storage type.
